text: The 8th World Freestyle Skating Championships were held in Paris, France from October 22 to October 26, 2014. 35 countries took part in the competition. ==Participating nations== 35 nations entered the competition. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Medallists== Zhang Hao Dasha Kuznetsova {| |- bgcolor="DFDFDF" | colspan="4" align="center"| Free jump |- ! scope=row style="text-align:left" | Junior Men | Pan Yu Shuo | Xiao Bing Sheng | Chan Man Fung Anson |- ! scope=row style="text-align:left" | Junior Women | Lu Qian Qian | Lo Pei Yu | Feng Hui |- ! scope=row style="text-align:left" | Senior Men | Savio Brivio | Jimmy Fort | Ye Hao Qin |- !
